name: P6: Solihull
description:
You are Leonard, an ordinary guy who's life is totally ordinary but also totally boring

You move to the picturesque town of Soilhull and immediately your life gets like completely game-ended like tonight in this money-based, transactional society idk

Help Leonard survive his ten minute stay in the beautiful English town without being blown up by some guy outside the like news and magazine shop on Edgware Road or something who cares

Features!

  • Turn based combat with attacks such as "gaming ray", "Big Gungy", and "grub"
  • Fully voice-acted! (By me so it's not very good)
  • High-stakes narrative wherein Leonard goes to Solihull and maybe dies idk
  • 3D!
  • Subtitles!
  • You know that meme where it's like, the demotivational poster template but the caption is just "what", yeah there's one of those I put one of those in
  • And best of all: etc.!

I made this game in like four days because I saw a tweet that was funny and decided to turn it into a Unity project. 

If you like this game, I post about other gamedev stuff (and more besides) on my twitter. You can also see some of my other work on my website.

This game is in version 1.1. It is finished and playable to completion, and most serious experience-impacting bugs have been removed, but some bugs may remain - please report any you encounter.
